EmailTemplate.description: Notification email HTML sent when a case is logged online for Portugal (English)
EmailTemplate.name: EUR_Case Confirmation - online HTML (English) - myIATA info
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for submitting your question to us online. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been created and one of our Customer Support Representatives will get back to you shortly. Please use the above Case Number if you need to contact us in regards to this case.
Case Subject: "{!Case.Subject}" Case Description: "{!Case.Description}"
We would like to take this opportunity to inform you of our new customer interface: ‘myIATA’. This online service will greatly facilitate your day-to-day transactions with IATA.
In a first place, this service will include:
Ticket Management (‘track & trace’ deliveries, order history) E-Invoicing (online access to all your IATA invoices) Customer Service (document & form centre, FAQ, log an enquiry) An easy-to-use account management functionality to ensure that all your staff can access the same information.
Your agency have been notified by mail, addressed to the Manager, of the availability of this new interface and how to ensure all concerned people in your agency can benefit from myIATA services offered. New services will be launched continously during the next months. Stay tuned! Visit www.myiata.org!
Best regards,
IATA Service Centre Europe
{!Case.Thread_Id}
